channel.title: A little question
channel.description:
Uhm, a little question.
If jagex will find my server, how are they gonna contact me if they want to ask if i can shut it down?

item.title: A little question
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:3, topic:379638”]They’d probably contact your hosting provider, or you via email. Your hosting provider would then probably axe you and send you an email explaining their situation. But I doubt Jagex would hand pick your server out of the many huge ones.

They won’t logon your server and inform you. But really, if you’re some hosted hosted server with a tiny player base they really won’t be interested.[/quote]
Ah, okay, thanks. And no, I’m not planning on hosting a huge server. Just little 508 server with max 10-20 players.

Read full topic

item.title: A little question
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

They’d probably contact your hosting provider, or you via email. Your hosting provider would then probably axe you and send you an email explaining their situation. But I doubt Jagex would hand pick your server out of the many huge ones.

They won’t logon your server and inform you. But really, if you’re some hosted hosted server with a tiny player base they really won’t be interested.

Read full topic

item.title: A little question
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

I think they’ll just remove your Webclient (if you have one).
